WindowVrdisplaypresentchange_event.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The vrdisplaypresentchange event of the WebVR API is fired when the presenting state of a VR display changes — i.e. goes from presenting to not presenting, or vice versa.

blockquote.para: Note: This event was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.

-WebVR API homepage
- — demos, downloads, and other resources from the Mozilla VR team.
